resources.string: Are you sure you want to quit?
Are you sure you want to restart?The current game will be lost.
Please choose an item. The game will restart automatically after you press OK.
The number you type must be more than the current minimum number.
The number you type must be less than the current maximum number.

Play games with your friends! We will create a number randomly between the range shows on your screen. The number is called "Bomb". And it won\'t show at the beginning as well as hide behind the"- -". Please minify the range and make your friends to detonate the "Bomb". Careful! Don\'t get hurt!

In order to minify the range, the number every player type must be MORE than the current minimum number(on the left of the "Bomb") and LESS than the current maximum number(on the right of the "Bomb").
Change the maximum number:You can change the range by changing the maximum number.
Sounds: You can turn on or turn off the sound.
Record(coming soon): The bomb and the person who detonated the bomb will be recorded if you turn on this function.
A work by 钚科创 / Plutonium.

Welcome to my GitHub! You can get the source code of this app.
